pull_request.title: feat: add WebSearch tool + sources output; add deprecated max_tokens; docs: minor fixes
pull_request.body:
## New features

* Web search tool
  * Added WebSearchTool schema with types `web_search` and `web_search_2025_08_26`.
  * New options:
    * `filters.allowed_domains` to restrict search domains (subdomains included).
    * `user_location` using `WebSearchApproximateLocation` (country, region, city, timezone).
    * `search_context_size` with `low` | `medium` | `high` (default `medium`).
  * Tool union now includes `WebSearchTool` (alongside existing preview and other tools).
* Web search sources in responses
  * `WebSearchToolCall` can now include a `sources` array of URL sources.
  * `additional_output_data` now supports `web_search_call.action.sources` to include web search sources in model responses.
* Chat completions parameter
  * Added deprecated `max_tokens` request parameter (prefer `max_completion_tokens`; not compatible with o-series models).

## Fixes

* Documentation cleanups:
  * Punctuation update in the "Create a conversation." example title.
  * Simplified description for the conversation creation endpoint.
